1_1HSBkju9y9tQrpph3yKgcdzxM6pnkvgmNy.body: I don't know why it doesn't show the title...

> [kaffie](#comment_5_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Click and drag the top right icon to the left. Scroll down and there'll be a section called "Site Title". Set it to what you want and hit 'save changes'. Then sign/publish.

Thank you! I dind't even notice there was a menu hidden there :)
